title: My Silent Loud: The Voice Inside Every Little Black Boy
description: ★★★★★ "Please read this book and receive the healing and release that it offers!" - Reader review___A powerful and deeply moving memoir that will inspire young black boys to strive for more and be heard!Do young black boys have a voice and can they dare to dream?My Silent Loud explores the thoughts and feelings of the author with the hope and dream that it will give a voice to silent little black boys who wish that someone would listen to them.Young boys who yearn for someone to ask them what they are thinking about. With this book, the author strives to help all black boys shift their thinking from "I can't" to "I must!" A truly striking memoir that will touch the reader and encourage them to be the best they can be. Order your copy NOW and open up to be the one who listens to black boys everywhere!
author: Malik Muhammad
